title: Smutty's Wedding, Nightclub, New York City

description: young man in jacket with velvet lapels and cuffs and bandana tied around his neck, smoking a cigarette and touching the front of his pompador hairstyle with his PL hand; 3 other figures reflected in mirror at R; bar at front of image
